headline: Kazakh Oilfield Cuts Production After Russian Gas Plant Drone Attack
summary: Kazakhstan’s Karachaganak oil and gas field has reduced production following a Ukrainian drone attack on a Russian gas processing plant, though Kazakhstan assures its gas supply remains uninterrupted.

headline: Your Portfolio Is Not Ready for Retirement: 3 ETFs to Secure Your Financial Future
summary: Life insurance provider John Hancock just released its Longevity Preparedness Index, a survey to measure U.S. adults’ ability to live well in older age. It reveals a sobering reality: Americans score just 60 out of 100 in readiness for longer lifespans, with finances a glaring weak spot. As life expectancy rises — potentially doubling the ... headline: Enhanced Oil Recovery Forecast Report 2025: A $68.38 Billion Market by 2033 Featuring Baker Hughes, BP, Chevron, Exxon Mobil, Halliburton, Praxair, Shell, Schlumberger, TotalEnergies, Weatherford
summary: The Enhanced Oil Recovery (EOR) Market is projected to grow from US$ 47.64 billion in 2024 to US$ 68.38 billion by 2033, with a CAGR of 3.04% from 2025-2033. Key drivers include aging wells, declining oilfield production, and innovative EOR techniques. EOR technologies like thermal, chemical, and gas injection boost oil extraction from difficult reservoirs, catering to rising global energy demands. Challenges include high costs and environmental concerns, but advancements in AI and sustainable p

headline: Energy Transition Update - Navigating Renewable Energy Challenges In The U.S. Power Industry
summary: An upcoming seminar in Philadelphia, organized by Research and Markets, will delve into the complexities of the U.S. electric power industry, with a particular focus on the integration and development of renewable energy sources. The event is designed to educate participants on various aspects including grid structure, renewable energy project opportunities, and the intricacies of ISO auctions and financial transactions in the energy market. Attendees will gain insights into overcoming...
